Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Drop Pod
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Astartes Drop Pod epitomizes rapid deployment and shock assault. Crafted with brutal efficiency, its utilitarian design bears battle scars and chapter-specific iconography, reflecting the harsh aesthetic of the 41st millennium.

The hinged doors, carrying the weight of the chapter's honor, swing open upon deployment, revealing the assault's heart. The Drop Pod is more than a vessel; it's a harbinger of war, carrying the Emperor's wrath.

Internally, arcane machinery and stasis racks for Astartes weaponry fill the pod. Cables connect to dormant war gear awaiting activation upon descent.

Upon touchdown, the Drop Pod disgorges Space Marines into the battle, echoing the uncompromising nature of the Astartes and symbolizing the Imperium's relentless resistance against the encroaching darkness in GrimWorld 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Operator x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
